General.Name: Jones Tech PLC Class A
General.Description: Jones Tech PLC provides materials solutions for intelligent electronic equipment in Asia, Europe, and America. The company offers thermal conductivity graphite products, such as synthetic graphite, natural graphite, graphene high thermal conductivity film, etc; thermal interface materials; EMI shielding materials; heat pipes; vapor chambers; and thermal modules. Its products are used in telecommunication, intelligent terminal, smart home, new energy automobile, medical equipment, industrial automation, power and energy, and big data processing. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No. 3, Donghuan Middle Road, Beijing, China
